For purpose , clinical data patient 3-vessel intermediate coronary artery disease , whose FFR measure 3-vessels due clinical need , analyze .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Implication 3-vessel Fractional Flow Reserve ( FFR )
DOC.detailed_description: Primary Analysis The Primary Analysis perform 2-year follow-up data complete . Pre-specified Subgroup Analysis The pre-specified subgroup analysis perform 1-year follow-up data complete accord follow subject : - Concordant discordant result FFR angiographic stenosis severity ( patient lesions pre-PCI FFR analyzed. ) . - Association total atherosclerotic burden total ischemic burden , coronary CT angiography substudy ( 2-year follow-up complete ) . - Validation total ischemic burden ( sum 3 vessel FFR ) Duke score , measure treadmill test . - Comparison clinical outcome defer lesion accord pre-PCI FFR level ( Pre-PCI FFR < 0.75 , 0.75-0.80 , > 0.80 ) .
DOC.criteria: Subject must least 18 year age . Subject must stenosis ( > 30 % visual estimate ) 3epicardial coronary artery . FFR measure 3vessels end procedure . Depressed leave ventricular systolic function ( ejection fraction < 35 % ) STelevation myocardial infarction within 72 hour , Prior coronary artery bypass graft surgery Creatinine level > = 2.0mg/dL dependence dialysis Abnormal final myocardial flow ( TIMI flow < 3 ) Planned bypass surgery Failed FFR measurement Failed intend revascularization
